speaker.whotheyare: YeYoon Kim develops professional communities at the Project Management Institute.
speaker.whylisten: YeYoon Kim is passionate about developing nonprofit boards, volunteer leaders and building diverse and effective teams. She is a master event organizer and works to bring zest and humor to her teams and communities. At the Project Management Institute (PMI), she supports PMI chapters and communities in 20 countries across the Asia Pacifc region, spanning from India to New Zealand.
